name: Penguin Run (itch) (Thetha)
description:
CONTROLS

Tap the top half the screen to move and the bottom half to move down.

PICKUPS

Fish - Grants you points.

Skull - Kills you.

Shield - Protects against one hit .

Snowflake - Slows your movement for one second.

Lightning - Speeds up your movement for one second.

PERMISSIONS

Access files: for saving and loading high scores

CREDITS

"Island Game GUI" by Craftpix
